website_summaries.verdict: A set of stainless steel mixing bowls that come with some great features cooks will love.
pros: Includes measurement marks on the inside of the bowls to help you gauge ingredient amounts
Thicker than other bowls on the market
cons: Lids are functional but not watertight and could leak if the bowls get knocked on their sides

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I previously wrote a revue when I got the product and was very happy about it but 2 months down the line, I started to notice rust on the inside of the edges. I hand clean them and from time to time dish wash them, they are not supposed to rust at all as they are made of Stainless Steel but they did. Still like the product but not the rust!
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleasantly surprised at the quality of these bowls, especially for the price. The lids fit reasonably well (it's not Tupperware tight, but still pretty good), and the quality of the bowls feels good. Assuming they hold up over the long term, they are a good investment for any kitchen. Update: After 4 months of use the lids have begun to warp. They won't stay on the bowls if put into the refrigerator. The lids have always been hand washed-never in the dishwasher. They fit okay until put into the refrigerator, then they warp because of the cold temperature (38 degrees in our fridge). Short term they were okay, but long term they begin to show the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Lids Did Not Fit and Could Not Get Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Loved them until I tried to use the largest bowl and the lid did not fit. Because I had not tried it before the return date, I had to reach out to the seller - who sent me back to Amazon. I ended up having to return the whole set and get another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Billy24

customer_reviews.title: Update - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: this is what I said when I first received the bowls " Nice bowls. They are heavy and the lids fit nicely and are easy to remove. The measurements inside the bowls is helpful. I am very happy with this purchase" Now that I have used them they are totally useless as the lids do not fit once they are used one time. I did not place them in the dishwasher only rinsed them cleaned after the first use. I had a nice set of bowls that I gave away because they had no lids. Now I spent money on more bowls that have no lids. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Pogo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The website description is inaccurate. The lids are made of plastic, not silicone.
customer_reviews.author: amazon

customer_reviews.title: Rusted or busted?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these "stainless steel" bowls seven months ago. I put stainless steel in quotes because these bowls have spots of rust on them....real stainless doesn't rust. If this happened within the return period they would have gone back. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill L.

customer_reviews.title: Inside scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get these mixing bowls. They work well and I like the rubber bottoms they have as they help the bowl grip to the surface they’re on. I made cupcakes and frosting using these bowls and noticed after I washed them, the bowls I used are scratched on the inside from the electric mixer I used. Photos show one bowl with scratches and another unused bowl with no scratches. Maybe I missed something stating that I wasn’t supposed to use an electric mixer with these bowls? Mildy disappointed with them after this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set of bowls. Love the bottom grip and the measuring marks on the inside! UPDATE : These bowls all rusted shortly after using. I wouldnt waste my money. Looking for new bowls
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Rusting
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: after just one or two uses, these are starting to rust where the rim is folded over. Just got these, so haven't used them yet. They seem nicely made, heavy duty. I like the etching of the volumes inside. 4 stars because although the product description says the lids are silicon, they clearly are not.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bergsman

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t survive 1st dishwasher wash
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were threat, lids seem to seal vey well and they came well packaged. I put them in the dishwasher before the first use and after the wash, I noticed one of the lids had melted edges (see photos). I also noticed that none of the lids fit as tightly any longer. Hey still fit but they look a little warped and hey are very loose on the bowls. This is very disappointing as the product claims to be dishwasher safe and it clearly is not. I am returning them after 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Topaz

customer_reviews.title: The lids DO NOT stay on! They warp in the fridge...what is the point of having lids?
customer_reviews.text: Lids do not fit snugly at all. What is worse is that as they cool in the fridge, the fit gets worse as the lids warp. Essentially leaving your item uncovered. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure about these. I was looking for some decent mixing bowls and saw the reviews on these so I went ahead with the purchase. The bowls look nice and I like the anti slip silicone bottom. BUT NONE of the tops fit securely in place! So they basically lay on top loosely. Not sure if it’s just the set I bought or if anyone else has experienced this. I will probably return because their selling point for me was the secured lids but man what a pain to do so.
customer_reviews.author: J-mann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bowls, Good for Sourdough Making except the sizes, read on
customer_reviews.text: I wish that the 1.5 quart was 2.0 quarts, and that the 3.0 quarts was either 3.5 or 4.0 quarts, and the 5 quart was 5.5 quarts. This is because I am making sourdough bread and the sizes I'd like would work better. However, all in all, they are wonderful bowls, well shaped, non slip bottoms, heavy enough gauge true stainless, and they don't adversly effect dough rising chemically. They are almost perfect, just the size change and keep everything else as is and they'd be just right. I recommend these
customer_reviews.author: BubbaDooba

customer_reviews.title: Lile cereal bowls (worthless)
customer_reviews.text: These are comically small and utterly worthless for any mixing, baking, cooking they are OK for small foods or holding left overs. Total waste of money I used the smallest to hold my car keys. The other I took out to my shop to hold nuts and bolts while doing a project. Very deceptive looking, look nice but look like they belong in a doll house when u get them.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Stainless Steel Non -Slip Mixing bowls.
customer_reviews.text: The lids do not fit properly. "Please contact me..." Great quality stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Alleyspazz

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: Bowls seem great, but one of the smaller bowls has a lid that simply does not fit. The lids overall seem pretty cheap and warped. The bowls themselves seem like high quality but I bought this set specifically for nice, tight fitted lids.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Holm

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I never considered the dramatic difference in something as simple as a regular mixing bowl and a bowl like these with a silicone bottom. I love that I can have these bowls on the counter and mix things inside of them without them sliding around everywhere and wobbling. I like the engraved measurements too. The smallest bowl is about the size of a regular bowl and the largest bowl is huge! The lids are great too cuz they snap into place on top of the bowl and although I don’t think it’s totally airtight it does make a good seal that should be adequate for short term leftovers or storage.
customer_reviews.author: Guy-who-buys-things

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was encouraged when I pulled the box out of the shipping carton and it said "18/10" on the side. But the bowls did not have the "heft" you'd expect of true 18/10 stainless. Also, as one previous reviewer noted, the lids are NOT silicone., as stated in the product description: they are flexible plastic -- nice enough, but not silicone. Two strikes, and back they go.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H. Lowndes

customer_reviews.title: Lids don't fit
customer_reviews.text: Great price, but the lid is too small on them once they chill in the fridge and shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Belal B. Alkadimi

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Lids Don't Seal!
customer_reviews.text: I have been really disappointed with this purchase. The lids do not seal, therefore making them only useful as mixing bowls, which is not what I needed. Buy another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Spage

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the SST bowls, and the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the SST bowls, and the bottom anti skid covering is 5 star. But, the lids, and the material they are made of do not function very well if storing in the refigerator,. . The covers "pop off" the bowls, as they become stiff when at cold temp. Have to use plastic wrap to keep the food covered. Thus the 3 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: If you want them for the lids, buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, and I do...BUT the kids after a few washes (I hand wash them) get warped and then won’t fit snuggly on the bowls, so they end up being pretty useless. I love the rubber bottoms of the bowls, and they are sturdy and easy to clean. But I bought these because they had lids...and now they can’t even be used.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! They have some heft to them, they feel and look premium. The polished finish is very nice and the inside is smooth. The name is laser written on the front. And the silicone bottom is super nice on the granite countertops. Keeps it quiet and stable. Flat bottom add to the stability. I really love these bowls and am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kauble

customer_reviews.title: Even more than what we hoped for
customer_reviews.text: We just needed some cheap, sturdy mixing bowls but I am so glad we got this set- we wouldn't have known what we were missing. They store super easily for getting so many, they have a cool storage feature (for leftover cookie dough or whatever else), the no-slip bottom is easier to mix with and fewer accidents, and then there are even discreet measurement markers in the bowls themselves. It's honestly the little things, the person who made these definitely spend a lot of time in the kitchen. Seriously, throw out your mixing bowls and get these!
customer_reviews.author: Emily L.

customer_reviews.title: Good set of bowls
customer_reviews.text: I like the non-slip and the fact that they have lids. I can put butter in the bowl and put the lid on while it softens for cookies, and I can cover my popcorn if I don't finish it. I also like that I can stack them in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Swanstrom-Moore

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn't stay on
customer_reviews.text: So I love the bowls them self. I did read a review that said the lid didn't snap on and I didn't believe them so I went ahead and bought the bowls. The bowls are great for mixing and store beautifully! However, the lids do not stay on. When I tried to put the lid on, the other side would pop up and it just wouldn't snap down. That is a little frustrating when you want to use it for leftovers in the fridge. Oh well though. The silicone bottom works great too and the bowls clean up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Madyson Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love the bowls but I the big lid doesn't work on mine.
customer_reviews.text: I need to contact them and see if they will offer replacement lids. I love the bowls but the big lid doesn't work for mine. I love everything else about them though. The size of the bowls is fantastic and they do have markings on the inside for measurements which is EXTREMELY nice! The non slip on the bottom is great and feels to be made extremely well. The only thing that seems a little flimsy are the lids. I wish they were made of a different material. However, I would buy again. They next in the cupboard so well with the lids on top. The stainless steel is heavy and nice. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUSLY BEST KITCHEN PURCHASE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I'm a picky kitchen accessories person and I actually postponed ordering these for about a week. Finally I caved and gosh I'm so glad I did!!! These are the most fantastic mixing bowls ever. The large one has a measuring cup etched inside, the lids lock in SO tight it definitely doubles as amazing Tupperware. The rubber bottom makes it so easy to stir without the bowls sliding all over. MUST BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: The bowls are beautiful but the lids need work!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are beautiful!! I really like the measurement etching on the inside of each bowl. I only have one negative comment and that is the lids that come with this set of bowls do not fit very well!! They fit down inside the top lip of the bowls and they are really loose. Because of this, I cannot store anything in these bowls because it would spill very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy🦚

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls with sturdy base/grip
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are great! They have a really nice sturdy base, so when you are mixing the bowl wont take off on you in a different direction. They have measurments on the inside of the bowl for your baking needs. They all have matching lids, come in handy when marinating items in them etc. and they nest wonderfully! I am very happy so far. I have only had them a couple months, and only hand washed the 2 I have used so far.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bowls!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond pleased with these. I've had them for a few weeks. They may scratch up easily.... bit I store them inside each other on an empty shelf. (Do not keep near pots and pans... They will scratch up). I had wash. The silicone in bottom is great. Lids are more plastic. Not silicone. Tight seal. They store food nicely. I store chopped romaine in the next to smallest one and it keeps longer than in plastic wear. They are really beautiful. In had family members admiring them during a party. I used them to serve chips in. Almost want another set.... just because 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISWASHER SAFE - Lids warped within a month
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking sturdy bowls. I only have one grouch - and that's about the cheap make of the lids! The lids warped within one wash in the dishwasher. Definitely wash the lids by hand! Another bowl's lid suddenly became loose (this one wasn't dishwashed) after a night in the refrigerator. It wasn't airtight.
customer_reviews.author: Aakansha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bowls
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy well made bowls. I chose them because it looked like they had sturdy lids that won’t crack over time which is a problem I’ve had on previous bowl sets. The silicone bottoms keep the bowls steady and the bowl lids fit tight. The only negative criticism is the measurements on the inside are hard to read. This wasn’t one of the features I cared about so it’s not a deal breaker for me. The bowls are nice and deep. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: sandykat828

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife because she has used plastic mixing bowls for a long time. These look great, professional, and they function very well. The only minor negative aspect of the set is that the largest bowl is not as large as some other large bowls in other sets. Just make sure it will meet your needs prior to purchasing the set. The non-slip bottoms truly do not slip so you don’t have to waste effort holding them down with significant force while using them.
customer_reviews.author: RLP

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to purchase these bowl they are absolutely beautiful but on my very first wash they were ruined!!!! 1 wash!!!!! What a disappointment. I wish they were higher quality. Honestly just invest a bit more money and buy higher quality bowls now these are trash and I have to buy new ones
customer_reviews.author: Alli J

customer_reviews.title: Great mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why some have had issues such as rust or the lids, I have not at all but I hand wash and don't put them in the dishwasher (I actually don't use my dishwasher at all). I love these. Very convenient that there are four sizes, they don't slide on the counters, and love that I can use the lid to store in the fridge. My boyfriend loves them too and wants to get his own set.
customer_reviews.author: A. R.

customer_reviews.title: Bowls look great aesthetically but the lids don't really seal too well
customer_reviews.text: Like the looks but functionality wise not so good. Lids don't seal especially on the larger bowls.. if you push one side and the other side pops out and vice
customer_reviews.author: C.L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great aside from lid not fitting
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls however the lid does not fit on the largest bowl. I am currently debating if I should return them or not. Great other than that but bummed the largest bowl doesn’t have a working lid that fits. Update, company sent me anew lid for the one the wouldn’t fit... no questions asked! Only small complaint after some use is they do scratch but I imagine that’s normal with metal bowls.
customer_reviews.author: stonefamily

customer_reviews.title: Lids warped
customer_reviews.text: The bowls are fine, but I had an immediate problem with the lids. The lid material is not durable, or sturdy in design, and after first washing, the lids warped, and will no longer fit on. If you seal down one side of the lid, the other half pops back up, and won't stay. I should have sent these back. Not satisfied in their performance at all.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  I really like the non-skid bottom.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these bowls for a couple weeks and use them regularly. I bought them to replace a set of stainless bowls I've had for many years because I wanted bowls with covers. These bowls have covers, come in 4 sizes, and have a nice non-skid bottom that helps when using them. Even though I really like the bowls I gave them 4 stars not 5 only because sometimes the lids take a little work to get to seal. However, I really like that the lids are inset when on the bowls and that makes them easy to stack in the refrigerator. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: susan4tpierce

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.  Very good stainless steel bowl set.
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are absolutely wonderful. They are very good quality stainless steel. They grip the counter and do not slide because of the bottom. The lids are very nice to have. The largest bowl isn't really large but the quality is excellent. I would bury them again
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ruff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bowls that don't move around on the counter when I'm stirring!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the same hand-me-down stainless steel bowls from my mother-in-law for more than 25 years! I starting cooking at home more and it became obvious that I needed more than 2 stainless steel bowls. I selected these bowls because they had lids with them and had non-slip bottoms. I wish I had ordered them years ago. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J Loop

customer_reviews.title: Useless Lids
customer_reviews.text: The bowls themselves are great. Hardy, don't scratch easily, don't bend, and stack well. The lids are borderline useless, and I wish I had bought a different set. If you buy this set, you are buying it for bowls, not bowls with lids. You may as well throw the lids away.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Croft

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls, but not for storing food
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about getting these bowls, and pictured that the cover could be used for transporting or storing food once it's made. I must have missed the part that says the lid simply lies on the top, it does not seal. If I were to make a salad and wanted to bring it to work or store in the refrigerator, these lids don't seal or close in any way. They simply sit on the top of the bowl and will fall off if the bowl is tilted. But besides that, these are great bowls. Sturdy, easy to clean, don't slip around on the counter, great for stirring things in.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki1

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, nest and have lids for storage and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted bowls that are lightweight, easy to nest and not so tight that they are remove each bowl and have lids for storage. These fit the bill! They grip the counter so they don’t slide when mixing and they look beautiful! Great product! I replaced three sets of bowls (plastic mixing bowls, a large set of ceramic mixing and a set of lidded glass bowls) with this one set.
customer_reviews.author: Alex L. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but...
customer_reviews.text: These lidded mixing bowls are amazing. However... the 1.5 quart's lid did not fit correctly, was too loose or small and didn't form a vacuum seal. Aside from that manufacturing error, it kept our uncooked food fresh and cool for transport long enough to travel two states over and cooked just in time for Christmas. The rubber bottoms helped the bowls stay put from sliding all over the trunk. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Elodie

customer_reviews.title: I bought these as a gift and liked them so much that I ordered a set for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift and liked them so much that I ordered a set for myself. I have used them once since they arrived - about 2 days ago and am very happy with them, especially the gripper bottoms and lids. As a home economist, I always taught students to put a damp cloth under bowls and cutting boards to keep them from sliding around on counters and tables. These bowls will eliminate the need for that. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meemas 5

customer_reviews.title: Super useful!
customer_reviews.text: Super useful! I've been using these bowls for the last 2,5 years nearly every day. They are great for storing food, for mixing, for whisking, for making dough, for cooling bottles in ice, for WHATEVER. Simple, very easy to clean, nice looking. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H

customer_reviews.title: Look nice and seem sturdy but are a bit shallow for electric mixer use
customer_reviews.text: These looked very nice and I really wanted to keep them, but I had intended to buy bowls that were deep enough to use with a handheld mixer and not splatter things everywhere... There may be some dimensions in the description, so make sure they suit your purpose - it was my neglect for not checking the depth of the bowls. I already have plenty of bowls to use for mixing a salad or dry ingredients, which these would be fine for, so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: StephI

customer_reviews.title: love the sizes
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls! This particular set is heavy duty and will probably last longer. Great for storing food, and quick serving. Of course the bottoms help the bowl from slipping on the counter when you stir. I toss them in the dishwasher (the tops I put on the top) The sizes are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design but......
customer_reviews.text: The bowls look nice and the concept is great. However, only 1 lid sealed for storage. The other lids did not seat and appeared to have shrunk/ curled in the dishwasher even though the packaging states it is dishwasher safe. The no slip grip is fantastic. I would not purchase this product again due to the lids. If you are not planning on keeping items stored then these bowls are great.
customer_reviews.author: James Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Very good - except covers
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, heavy weight stainless steel bowls but the black covers don’t close well. I push the covers in as much as I can, but one side always tend to pop out. When I get to close them all the way, I still find a side popped open when I retrieve them from fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwormy

customer_reviews.title: Bellemain Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the bowls once since ordering; however, since Thanksgiving is two days away I anticipate using them quite a bit. The bowls are very attractive and seem quite sturdy, also, the lids fit securely on the bowls. The initial time I used the bowls was to make pancake batter. The bowls worked great. The nonslip bottom is a plus. The bottom helps control the bowl movement when mixing. I can't give the mixing bowls five stars because I have only used them once, but I would recommend these mixing bowls to to anyone looking to purchase an attractive, sturdy set of stainless steel mixing bowls.
customer_reviews.author: M.NPR

customer_reviews.title: Best mixing bowls we could find.
customer_reviews.text: We were searching for a few weeks for some nice stainless mixing bowls to get rid of our plastic ones. We had ordered a couple of different sets, but they were really thin walled and not sturdy(slip all over the counter). This set has my wife extremely happy and looking to find a larger bowl than the largest one in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Hyma

customer_reviews.title: THE LIDS DON’T FIT!!
customer_reviews.text: So mad! None of the lids fit! I bought this set of bowls because it came with lids. WHAT A WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: These bowls have a beautiful mirror finish and are very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These bowls have a beautiful mirror finish and are very sturdy. I'm not really a fan of the non-slip bottoms because if you put them in the fridge and try to push them back or to the side they truly are "non-slip" and will tip over. The lids don't go all of the way down to the lip but they are sealed even if it appears otherwise. My food is always fresh. The bowls and lids nest nicely as well. I would recommend these bowls.
customer_reviews.author: pipeguy

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls! The only thing I feel that I would have liked to know before purchasing is that the lids do not "seal" tight like a popular brand of storage containers. The lid does cover the food and sits flush on the bowl, but don't drop the bowl as the lid will fly off and you will have whatever you had in the bowl on the floor. The bowls themselves are EXACTLY what I expected them to be...didn't disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Bowls are small
customer_reviews.text: These bowls were for my son. We measured the quart capacity of bowls I have to order something similar and was surprised in the capacity of these bowls. If I tried to put 5 quarts of liquid in the 5 quart bowl, it would run up to the top. There would be no way to use this bowl to actually mix 5 quarts of batter. I’d call the 5 quart bowl a 4-1/2 quart at most. I’d change the description or let customers know they’re not really meant to hold the capacity listed.
customer_reviews.author: m28

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE these bowls!
customer_reviews.text: BEST mixing bowl bargain in the marketplace. Non slip bottoms, lids, measurement markings on the INSIDE of the bowl, dishwasher safe, stainless (so no staining!)...long list of features! I was first exposed to these when the FACE teacher in our school district added these bowls in her Foods Lab for student use. WOW; they are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Lids seem to shrink in the refrigerator - no seal.
customer_reviews.text: The bowls themselves are sturdy and high quality but the lids don't fit tightly enough. On the countertop they seem ok but storing food in the frig there's no seal. The lids seem to "shrink" and there's somewhat of a gap between lid and bowl. Also, the measurements inside are hard to read -- the printing is not clear or dark enough, so that feature is virtually non-existent. I was so disappointed. I returned my set because being able to keep the bowls in the refrigerator during food prep and for storage is key for me, which makes these useless in my kitchen. Unfortunately this has turned me off to the brand.
customer_reviews.author: cj burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great containers, terrible lids.
customer_reviews.text: Very good containers. Great for mixing and storage food when prepping. Only downside is the lids. They either came warped or warped when washing because they don't seal on the top. Makes me want to return them as I was hoping to be able to store food in them but the lids don't seal.
customer_reviews.author: Robbyho

customer_reviews.title: nice bowls,disapppointed by storage
customer_reviews.text: very nice bowls. when storing bowls inside each other (bowl/lid,bowl/lid etc),the large lid doesnt close over the large bowl. it still stores as 1 big bowl but not locked into each other.i do like the measurements on the inside of the bowl & inside of bowl is very shiney.nice.
customer_reviews.author: HALO

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice. I thought the inside was lined however it is not, the picture is a bit misleading as it appears the inside is black as well as the base and that is not the case. Like the silicone, bottom keeps the bowl in place when using. Stainless steel appears to be a better quality and the bowls are more substantial than many available. The price is really great for what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Linda5186

customer_reviews.title: I really like the weight of these and the lids fit well
customer_reviews.text: I really like the weight of these and the lids fit well. the measurements on the inside of the bowls are extremely handy and the non-slip bottoms make things much more stable (and safer). the only gripe I have is that I ordered these specifically because the description mentioned that the lids are bpa-free. but there is no paperwork and nothing on the box about this fact and that makes me a bit uneasy.
customer_reviews.author: a.c.r.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Bowls have great weight and feel great in the hand. Beautiful finish and the non-skid bottom is very helpful. Im not a professional chef so for my needs these are just fine. I’m sure I’ll be using these bowls for years to come. The only issue I have is that one of the lids is too large and doesn't stay on the bowl. The lids weren't that important to me so I would still recommend these bowls as long as you don't need the lids.
customer_reviews.author: Survivor77

customer_reviews.title: Great set of bowls !
customer_reviews.text: Smallest had some dings on the bottom inside but the others were perfect. My first set of non side bottoms and if you are used to sliding things around these will tip before they slip but definitely stays put when mixing. Covers work great, just center them up and pull up slightly on either tab while pushing down on the cover. Would buy again but don't think I'll ever have to and will recommend them to my friends ! Made in America makes them even better !
customer_reviews.author: ronpeterson49

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: Most of the stuff here is obvious, they're stainless steel, had tight fitting lids for use in storage and have a no-slip rubber base. What it DOESN'T tell you is, the rubber base is slightly concave so that when it sets on the counter it forms a slight suction that holds it solidly in place while mixing. I LOVE these bowls. They're also dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Dempsy Winans

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls, but lids pop off
customer_reviews.text: The non slip bottoms are great and the bowls are sturdy and nicely made. The only thing is that the lids don't stay on, they pop up off the bowl after pushing down all the way around. Not a problem if you don't intend on using them as storage. Work great for mixing!
customer_reviews.author: Harrie L. Kiar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Prep Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Best prep bowls I’ve ever owned. They really mean it when they say non-slip. These bowls are durable, easy to keep clean, and stack inside one another for easy storage. The lids are great, but they are not as snug as I would have expected. That’s the only flaw. But despite that, the bowls are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ND Irish Fan

customer_reviews.title: Bellemain Stainless Steel Non-Slip Mixing Bowls
customer_reviews.text: I received my items on time. When I took the bowls out of the box I was very suprised one, of how heavy they were. Which was great, because I know that they would stand up to the heavy use that I will make of them. Two of how shinny they were and not a sratch on them. I also love the lids they were thick and seal on the bowls real tight. I would defintely recommend this product. Thanks. JJ
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality Priced far far to Low!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these stainless steel bowls is astounding and with lids that actually fit and stay put is but one more reason to purchase a set of these bowls. The no slip bottoms also make for bowls that stay put when mixing whether by hand or with a hand held electric mixer. If I had a knock on the bowls and it is not really a knock I would like if the manufacturer made an eight quart bowl for really large salads. These bowls are TOP QUALITY and far and away the BEST value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Faster24

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying these bowls! They're sturdy, I love the non-slip bottoms, and the ability to pop a lid on them and put them in the fridge for easy food storage is genius. I put mine in the dishwasher, and the two larger lids have warped a little bit. I do use the heat-dry function though, so maybe it wouldn't have happened if I didn't use that. Those two lids are still usable though, they just don't look quite as nice or fit quite as snug any more.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Covers are shrinking....
customer_reviews.text: I stored my set away for a couple of years while I lived in another place. At this point, they were practically brand new and I packed them away in a climate controlled storage facility. So I returned, I was surprised to find the covers are not TIGHT fitting anymore. Oh well, so much for "Top Rated".
customer_reviews.author: Randall Mirk

customer_reviews.title: I use them everyday!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these bowls! I have honestly used them every day since they arrived. Very very nice. Im hoping these will last a long time. **UPDATE** Unfortunately i need to change my review from 5 stars to 3... The bowls are starting to rust in spots
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good bowls, flimsy lids
customer_reviews.text: The sizes are good and they stack together nicely but the lids are thin and flimsy. Be careful washing the lids in the dishwasher because the will warp a little. Overall though they were a good purchase and the plastic bottoms help keep them in place when working on a counter.
customer_reviews.author: dsgrimes79

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are amazing. Unlike other stainless bowls we've had, these have a flat non slip rubber base making them more stable to use as mixing bowls and easier to stack in the fridge. Likewise for the durable rubber lids. The lids are heavy duty and will support other full bowls stacked on top when using for storage in the fridge. To top this off, they look nice. I would buy these again in heartbeat and will likely be getting sets for my kids and friends as I think they would make great gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Really great product. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. Good quality, metal cleans well and easily. The lid is a huge plus. Make sure you press the middle of the lid down firmly to seal completely. The non-slip bottom is a plus for vigorous mixing. The two small bowls are pretty small though and more ideal for combining ingredients rather than mixing, because they are small enough that it is easy to slosh ingredients over the side mixing.
customer_reviews.author: Emily t

customer_reviews.title: Mix it up
customer_reviews.text: These are good. I used a whisk in one of mine and it stretched the whole inside up. So if you a whisk make sure it’s the plastic one. But they whole to the surface really well and the lids seal good. My big bowl I had a problem with doesn’t seal properly may just be a defective lid.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Bowls that don't slide
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. The bowls are solid with some weight, they don't slip around on the counter, and are taller than wide so they easily fit in a cupboard. I gave them a 4 only because the lids fit down into the bowl and are not airtight. I wasn't expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Pain

customer_reviews.title: Great mixing and storage bowls!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are fantastic. Beautiful, sturdy construction, non-slip with lids for storage (I didn’t realize they’d come with those). My only disappointment was that they’re a bit smaller than I had anticipated. However, their capacity is clearly conveyed in their description, so that’s on me.
customer_reviews.author: K-Hope

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not started to use this product, I will comment on the quality which seems to be as stated when I was trying to decide on which product to purchase. My choice was based on the review the product got. I am looking forward to using and I am sure I will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L.

customer_reviews.title: Lids are terrible - Bowls are great
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I wanted these so badly and they have failed. The bowls are wonderful but none of the lids still work as they were designed to despite hand-washing them. I missed the return window so am stuck. i would love to order more sets but without working lids it isn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter, liked them so much I had to get a set for myself. They are balanced and well made. Makes cooking a little more fun. Nice enough to serve in too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: Nifty
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but lightweight bowls. I really like the silicone bottoms, the bowls sit flat on the counter & don't dance around while using the mixer. The covers fit well & are quite handy (saves on plastic wrap). Box says they are oven safe up to 390 degrees, so I feel comfortable putting them in to keep something WARM while finishing up the rest of dinner. Also like the measuring guides.
customer_reviews.author: MissyM

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. No lid fits as a seal for the corresponding bowl so they are useless for storing or transporting food.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bowls, great lids, stay put on surfaces
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are attractive, high quality, and the non-slip feature is very nice, They are surviving use and frequent dishwasher use well. The lids are strong and not finger-breaking to put on like some other types I've used. I am very happy with the quality, price, appearance, durability, and sizing/functionality. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Too Late To Return
customer_reviews.text: I like the bowls but the lids all warped and don’t seal or sit flush
customer_reviews.author: CLP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bowls are of high quality and stack nicely. Love the covers that come with it. Glad I ordered them. Got a second set for my grown son who needed mixing bowls and he is very pleased with them. Would recommend this product to anyone who cooks/bakes.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Haenisch

customer_reviews.title: Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are great. The bottom of the bowls are non-skid easily mixing an easier job. The lids are great too. I use the big bowl to store my spaghetti when I make a large pot. Lid keeps it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: The lids do not fit.
customer_reviews.text: The kids do not fit the bowls. I spilled the contents trying to get it to close the first time and my husband even had to try for almost 5 minutes to get one of them to close. Do not buy these if you want something with a functional lid.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: lids dont stay
customer_reviews.text: the lids sit in the bowl, but dont clap in, so its a very loose seal and the lids often slide out of place. I love the rubber bottom but the lids are a dud
customer_reviews.author: Rockey

customer_reviews.title: Lids don’t fit
customer_reviews.text: These are cheaply made, I regret buying these. The lids don’t fit the bowls, they just fall off, what’s the point of offering lids if they don’t fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I wasn’t sure if these were going to be one of those Amazon products with a bunch of good reviews and then arrives cheap and lame... I debated for a while to go with this brand but I’m glad I did! They’re so nice and convenient, they’ve got great weight to them and are a top item I use in the kitchen now and I have a lot of kitchen stuff LOL
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Lids dont lid
customer_reviews.text: If the lids working doesnt matter to you, buy the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Mixing Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic mixing bowls. For the money you can really beat and bang on these and not worry about messing something up. They stand up to a hand mixer well. My only draw back is that the lids are either really difficult to get on, or, don’t seem to fit tightly at all. But, I got them for the bowls not the lids :)
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: TREAT YOUR WELF TO SOMETHING NICE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THEM I LOVE THEM I LOVE THEM I LOVE THEM!!! These bowls are not only functional, but so darn nice looking, I don't want to use them sometimes!!! They make a great gift for yourself or someone else. Great for a beginner, or expert in the kitchen. These bowls will last for years. I usually use a scraper (spatula) to mix with, and just.....just great!
customer_reviews.author: tannika paschal

customer_reviews.title: Better then I could of imagined
customer_reviews.text: I needed more bowls as I am cooking more due to our current status and I wasn’t expecting much. These are fabulous I just started using them. I was so surprised and impressed they measuring cup lines in the bowls which is super great and less dishes. Also, the diversity you can put in oven.( I have not done this yet). The BPA cover is my only hiccup mine is not fitting on the pot so some air is getting in. Otherwise Great product so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Stacey S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great bowls! Great value for this set! They stack together great with the lids and are well made and attractive. Super fast shipping, great purchase! Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amy J.

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless still
customer_reviews.text: I have had these bowls for a year with a minimal use and it is already has rusted spots all over. It says it is a stainless still which should not rust. The waste of your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy bowls. They look and feel like quality. Very happy with them. I like that they are a little taller, and less wide for the same capacity. Would make a nice wedding shower gift too.
customer_reviews.author: River Run

product_meta.title: Top Rated Bellemain Stainless Steel Non-Slip Mixing Bowls with Lids (4-Piece Set)
feature_bullets: MEASURE, MIX AND STORE IN THE SAME CONTAINER: These are not your ordinary mixing bowls. Bellemain Mixing Bowls come with tight-fitting BPA-free silicone lids so your mixture stays fresh longer.
STYLISH UPSCALE MODERN DESIGN: Stainless steel always looks great, but extra touches like measurements etched on the inside of the bowl and no-slip silicone coating are both classy and functional.
NON-SLIP COATING MAKES YOUR JOB EASIER: The silicone coating on the bottom of the bowl looks great while keeping your bowl from flying out from under you no matter how vigorously you mix.
BELLEMAIN EXCELLENCE AND HIGH QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL: Your Bellemain Mixing Bowls can go from the freezer to oven to dishwasher without a problem. They’ll last a lifetime and will never rust.
THE MIXING BOWLS THAT MEASURE FOR YOU: The Bellemain difference means mixing bowls are never just mixing bowls - these double as measuring cups so you never wonder how much is in the bowl.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,847 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
